document_data.caption: A map showing Orsabbas's Fine Imports (labeled #17) on Vellarr's Lane.
document_data.name: Orsabbas's Fine Imports
document_data.mainbody: '''Orsabbas's Fine Imports''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The shop stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Orsabbas's Fine Imports was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the northeast side of [[Vellarr's Lane]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Services: In addition to their normal business, Orsabbas's Fine Imports also dealt in stolen property.
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by [[Ildar Orsabbas]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
